episodes.title: Is There a Difference Between a Religion and a Cult? (The Big Questions) (Part 2 of 2)
episodes.description:
Nicky Campbell asks, is there a difference between a religion and a cult?

Guests include Glenn Carter, President of the UK Raelian Movment; Professor Francesca Stavrakopoulou; Ian Haworth of the Cult Information Centre; Simon Cooper from the Unification Church; Rabbi Yitchak Schochet; Yoel Ben David from Jews For Jesus; Dr. Linda Dubrow-Marshall of the International Cultic Studies Association; Daily Telegraph columnist Christina Odone; Livingston Fagan, a member of the Branch Dravidian who was at Waco; Dr. Rod Dubrow-Marshall of the International Cultic Studies Association; author Cole Morton; Dr George Chryssides from Birmingham University; Juliana Buhring, who was brought up in The Children of God and is now a director of Safe Passage Foundation; Barbara Weed, who has not seen her son since he became involved in an internet group four years ago; and Jon Atack, author of A Piece of Blue Sky. (BBC The Big Questions, 20th May 2012)
